name: unacademic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not involving a lot of studying and thinking: She prefers unacademic subjects such as drama and sport. His work is sometimes criticized by his colleagues for being unacademic.
Someone who is unacademic does not enjoy studying and learns more from experience than from books: He made some friends in a group of unacademic older boys. We should provide better options for unacademic children. Related word
academic
More examplesFewer examplesHis approach to the topic is refreshingly unacademic.He was an unacademic child who hated school.I don't think it makes much sense to force unacademic kids to stay in school.
